name: As I Recall
description:
Short game made for GoedWare game jam 7.

Game is fully functional and completable and also contains one optional secret to be discovered. Go give it a try and I am happy to receive some feedback! Have fun!

KNOWN BUGS ! / BE MINDFUL OF:
 * Beware of moving too close of the computers, you will get stuck!
 * Android cannot back-step with 'down'-key, that is not implemented (missing backwards walking animations and therefore was not implemented / no time.)
 * Remember: 'esc' -button allows you to switch to past version of that android / can give you more access permissions.


Controls:
Arrow keys -> move forward / change direction / terminal selections
Esc / cancel -> Android power-down / mind-travel to the past
Enter/Space -> Interact with doors/objects


Tried to learn more about bringing blender-animated characters to Godot with full animations.

All sounds are either self made or royalty free content from freesound.org

The jam was 7 days, but I only was able to start when day 5 was ongoing already.

Game is only playable on windows. If I get positive reviews, I might work on this more and maybe put it on steam.
